Articles.Content:
Is that normal that it give 800.03 kn of trust at really low altitude ? it feel crazy but i have tryed reinstalling the game and it still doing this lol !

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-06T17:41:16Z" title="06/06/2015 05:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 6, 2015</time> by Claw**

Well, if you're playing stock 1.0.2 (build 842) you should get something like this.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/zk6T4)

And when you break the sound barrier...

![0HWESUD.png](http://i.imgur.com/0HWESUD.png)

If you have 1.0.0 or 1.0.1 then yeah you might be getting a bit more.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-06T17:26:10Z" title="06/06/2015 05:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 6, 2015</time> by sal\_vager**
1.02 and thanks for the fast answer !

They arent turbojets anymore. They are turboramjets. They operate like turbojets at lower speed but once it speeds up, the ramjet activates and believe me ramjets are mighty beasts that descend from overpowered rule breaking super fast scramjets

> 
> 1.02 and thanks for the fast answer !

Good luck guys
and another question how high those can go?
Max thrust is at 13km or so, and the thrust becomes negligible at 20-22 km and shuts off by 25km.
